content: At https://github.com/gdcc/pyDataverse/issues/118#issuecomment-1967692585 @Leo Andreev let us know he created a PR for this a while ago: https://github.com/gdcc/pyDataverse/pull/142

Looks good! I think we can add this to the recent commits and it shouldn't affect the new httpx library, but add another layer of flexibility if there are special content-types Dataverse is not aware of.
Shall we open up a new PR with these changes to sync it to the current main branch?
Hmm, well, ideally @Leo Andreev would get credit for his commit. So I think syncing with the main branch would be best.
But there's no rush. I just wanted to bring it to our attention. Maybe we could discuss at a future pyDataverse meeting or something.
Of course, @Leo Andreev if you could sync the PR would be awesome :blush:
I will add it to the agenda for the hybrid meeting next week
I don't think he checks Zulip often. Can you please leave a comment on the PR for him?
